TEXT.TITLE: BUEHLER INTERNATIONAL INC <BULR> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr five cts vs 20 cts Qtly div two cts vs two cts prior Net 223,000 vs 1,418,000 Sales 15.3 mln vs 17.1 mln Year Shr 61 cts vs 81 cts Net 3,106,000 vs 5,940,000 Sales 63.0 mln vs 59.5 mln NOTE: 1986 net includes tax credits of 63,000 dlrs in quarter and 1,365,000 dlrs in year. 1986 net both periods includes 500,000 dlr pretax inventory writedown. Dividend pay March 27, record March 5. Reuter
